main event: Multiple UFO sightings and reports by USAF during May 1952 in North Korea.
interesting points: One object was described as oval and silvery, performing normal flight maneuvers., A UFO was observed rolling and then climbing steeply, making it difficult for pilots to track., Ground radar indicated unidentified objects during missions, leading to scramble responses from F-94 fighter jets., Some reports described the sightings as potential enemy balloons while others veered away from that conclusion., The sightings contributed to ongoing investigations by the USAF into the nature of unidentified aerial phenomena.
